project1.title: To Do App
project1.description: This project is an exploration of Firebase for To Do app. A app that allows people to create, edit and delete tasks. It Also gives ability to see completed tasks.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, Bootstrap, Webpack, Firebase, SCSS

project2.title: Developer Portal
project2.description: This Application is the exploration of React. A portal to gauge your progress as developer and keep track of resources you are interensted in.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, Bootstrap, Webpack, Firebase, SCSS, React

project3.title: Nutshell Chufas
project3.description: This project is group project exploring firebase and Webpack. Nutshell is a dashboard for people to organize their daily weather, events, articles, and chat messages.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, Axios, Firebase, CRUD, Webpack
